name: Gold-Terminating Terminator
description:
The year is 3030; Humanity has fallen against the robot pumpkin overlords. Now, nothing stands between them and turning the Garbo Earth into one giant pumpkin. 

Nothing, except for you.

You find yourself standing between the pumpkin hordes and the lid to the earth's core.
There are no reinforcments, no backup.
There are no weapons, nothing but a few spare chains and metal balls. 
So you do the only logical thing you can do, and strap the silver chains to the floor, and attach the Gold Chain that Terminates in a Spiky Gold ball to your end, to terminate these pumpkins.

You are Gold. 
You are Gold-Terminating. 
You are the Gold-Terminating Terminator.

Arrows to move around,
Shift to brake;
Last as long as you can, and take as many pumpkins to hell as you can.

---------------------------------------------------
